summary: The diff implements all three requirements. QuotationView.tsx is updated with a unified pricing table (SR, DOOR SIZE, SQ.FT, SINGLE COATING, DOUBLE COATING, DOUBLE + SAGWAN, LAMINATE), a Total row, a Coating Type Summary section, and print/PDF functionality. index.css adds print CSS rules hiding buttons and formatting for A4 output. All REQ-1, REQ-2, and REQ-3 acceptance criteria appear to be addressed based on the file summaries and truncated code.
